title: Perspectives on the Economy, and on the Opportunities Ahead
description: Speech to the Greater Boston Chamber of Commerce.  In her first speech as president of the Boston Fed, Susan Collins touched on a broad range of topics, including monetary policy, her vision as leader of the Boston Reserve Bank, and the work being done at the Bank to support a vibrant regional and national economy.
dc:creator: Collins, Susan M.
dc:subject: inflation; inflationary trends; price stability; maximum employment; labor market; inclusive economy; economic outlook; FedNow; Working Places
